title: Amaretto Layer Cake
ingredients: ['For the Cake', '520g sponge cake mix', '250ml single cream', '275ml amaretto liqueur', '3 eggs', '75ml vegetable oil', 'For the Cream', '100g instant vanilla dessert mix, such as Angel Delight', '250ml single cream', '6 tablespoons amaretto liqueur', '475ml double cream, whipped', '6 (28g) bars Daim chocolate, crushed', '50g chocolate, melted', '70g flaked almonds']
